messages.daily:
:tada: *Hey Team!* :tada:

Guess what? It's that time again where we pick our awesome *host for today's scrum daily*! :partying_face:

:star2: *Drumroll, please...* :star2:

:drum_with_drumsticks: :drum_with_drumsticks: :drum_with_drumsticks:

:sparkles: *Congratulations, <@{{name}}>!* :sparkles:

You've been chosen as our fantastic host for today! We're all excited to hear your updates and keep the energy high! :muscle: :smiley:

Let's make this scrum daily amazing and have a blast while we share our progress and plans! :rocket: :balloon:

Cheers to another productive day, team! :tada: :raised_hands:
messages.support:
:tada: *Hey Team!* :tada:

Guess what? It's that time again where we pick our amazing *support champion for integration tests*! :partying_face:

:star2: *Drumroll, please...* :star2:

:drum_with_drumsticks: :drum_with_drumsticks: :drum_with_drumsticks:

:sparkles: *Congratulations, <@{{name}}>!* :sparkles:

You've been chosen to provide support for our integration tests until the end of the day! We're all counting on your expertise and enthusiasm! :muscle: :smiley:

Let's make our integration tests flawless and have a productive day! :rocket: :balloon:

Cheers to your dedication and hard work, team! :tada: :raised_hands:
messages.payments-support:
:mega: *Exciting News!* :mega:

Today, we're thrilled to announce that our amazing support squad will be led by none other than {{name}}! :star2:

These superheroes are ready to tackle any challenge and make your day smoother and brighter. :woman_superhero: :man_superhero: :woman_superhero:

Feel free to reach out to them for any assistance you need. They're here to help and spread some joy along the way! :smile: :+1: :sparkles:

Let's give a big round of applause to {{name}}! :clap: :clap: :clap:

#SupportTeam #HeroesOfTheDay #HereToHelp

:rocket: :balloon: :blush:
